questions.question: 1. Which of the following are applications of BFS?

answers.a: To find the Minimum Spanning Tree (MST)
answers.b: To find the shortest distance to a node from the root

explanations.a: BFS is used in the MST algorithms but this is not the complete answer.
explanations.b: BFS can be used to find the shortest distance but this is not the answer.
explanations.c: BFS (or almost any traversal algorithm) can be used to find/detect cycles in an undirected graph but this is not the answer.
explanations.d: BFS can be used to solve all of the above problems due to the very nature/design of the algorithm.
